name: SynRun
description:
In this awesome game you will be able to run through the streets of the fictional city SynRun City.

 Slide, jump and dodge obstacles with what you whatever you can use at the rhythm of the music. 

There are 5 levels available so far that will be increased in future updates. 

Buy skins to be the coolest and badass player in the ranking. 

Travel in flying cars and avoid the dangers of the air, climb the buildings without gravity and destroy robots before they kill you!
